games.name: Chrono Cross
games.desc: Chrono Cross is a 1999 role-playing video game developed and published by Square for the PlayStation video game console. It is set in the same world as Chrono Trigger.

games.name: Final Fantasy 7
games.desc: Final Fantasy VII is a 1997 role-playing video game developed by Square for the PlayStation console. Full of magic & monsters

games.name: Fallout3
games.desc: RPG game about post nuclear war

games.name: Fortnite
games.desc: Fortnite is a free-to-play Battle Royale game with numerous game modes for every type of game player. Watch a concert, build an island or fight.
